features: The McKesson disposable razor is single-use.
Single edge razors with twin blades in an arch housing: cuts hair closer to the skin offering a smooth shave
Fixed razor heads with stainless steel blades; have a curved arm that delivers control and precision while shaving; ribbed handle for a firm grip
Flip-off cover for safety; shields against and eliminates the risk of injuries while handling and during storage
Ribbed and contoured handles for a comfortable grip

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: McKesson Disposable Twin Blade Razors McKesson Disposable Twin Blade Razors help facilitate safe and effective hair removal for a variety of healthcare applications. Designed for single patient use, this bulk box of medical safety razors features a fixed-head design with twin blades for quick and reliable shaving. The plastic handle is ribbed for a secure grip and precision handling. These razors are non-sterile, are not made with natural latex, and come with flip-off blade covers to help prevent injury. At a Glance: Disposable medical safety razors designed for single patient useTwin blade, fixed-head design for efficient hair removalRibbed and contoured handles for a secure and comfortable gripMcKesson Disposable Razors varieties include fixed and pivoting head styles with one, two, or three bladesMcKesson has supported healthcare providers with medical supplies and services for over 180 years

Single Use Disposable Razors for Effective Hair Removal Ideal for quick and effective shaving, McKesson Disposable Twin Blade Razors are a smart choice for healthcare facilities that need large quantities of single use razors to prep patients. This bulk box of 100 medical safety razors is intended for basic hair removal needs, with two stainless steel single-edge blades and a fixed, arched blade housing for a close, clean shave. Designed for Safe and Effective Shaving in Healthcare Applications These disposable medical razors feature a plastic handle with a contoured design, allowing for a secure grip and better handling while shaving. For added safety, each disposable razor comes with a flip-off protective cover to prevent accidents when not in use. These medical safety razors are non-sterile and are not made with natural rubber latex. Available in a Variety of Styles McKesson offers a variety of medical razors to fit your hair removal needs. Choose from single, twin, or triple-blade razors, with optional moisturizing strips for added comfort. Both fixed and pivoting head designs are also available, offering disposable razors for basic shaving needs as well as applications where the razor needs to closely follow the contours of the skin.

About McKesson: In Business for Better Health For over 180 years, McKesson has supported providers with the medical supplies they need to care for patients and run a healthy business. McKesson offers more than 300,000 products from leading national brands as well as its own private product label, and a suite of services to help businesses and facilities provide quality care, improve business performance, and manage time and expenses. McKesson improves the business of healthcare to help everyone focus on what matters most: patient health.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent twin blade disposable razor
reviews.reviewText: Sharp. Gives a good clean shave. Does not seem to clog up as bad as the Gillettes I had been using (which are difficult to find without the lub strip and which cost about 4-5 times more)!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Work just as well as the ones at Discount Store
reviews.reviewText: I had been trying repeatedly to purchase from the "Large Discount Store" generic two-blade disposable razors. But I want the ones WITHOUT the lubricating strip (slimy and interferes with cutting whiskers), and WITHOUT a pivoting head (which often changes angle and I cut myself).Got tired of not finding them, and I will not purchase the overpriced name-brand offerings. So I thought I'd give these a try. They work identically (sharpness, blade life) to the aforementioned generic ones that never seem to be in stock, and they are half the price of the ones on the shelves.Very pleased.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewText: #pleAsed...the only razors l can use, everyday. They are disposable which makes things easier to clean up. After using a razor & reusing it again my skin doesn't feel clean thats why the disposable razors are the best. This tyme l purchased 2 📦

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: They're very good overall, sharp, practical, get the job done, OK value for money,but sometimes feels like its scratching your skin... Its not scratching you, just feels that way... Does not leave marks though...

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Bought for hubby and brother...both love them...great price!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very good razors
reviews.reviewText: This is my second time ordering them. Gives you a good close shave. I think they're just as good or better than what you buy at the store but cheaper.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 2, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Just got the 100 pack from UPS today. I decided to try one of these bad boys out real quick just now and see how it would work. Yeap! IT MADE ME BLEED. Beautiful razors. Better than I expected. I used one razor after freshening up my face with my Babyliss Pro double foil, then attacked the rest of the stubble with the blade. Yes, I was expecting to bleed. I like my shaves close, when I do shave. I can easily go for 2 or 3 days after a good close shave before having to shave again. This gave me exactly that. Lack of pivoting head? Whatever, manipulate the blade head with your hand. Bleeding? Duh, I keep mentioning that. Just learn to shave your face more gently and you'll be fine. Since you can shave so close, you'll be able to look fresh if you shave the night before or before a shower. Between a good double foil razor and these blades, I was able to shave in less than 5 minutes and it looks as good as if I had gone to the barber and paid a premium. Very happy. And better still, the blade is still sharp and clean so I'll get another use out of it. Oh yeah, there's 100 of them, for $19 with free shipping. Can't really go wrong here, I'll be back for more.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Shave like a knife
reviews.reviewText: This product cuts really smooth. Will be ordering it again,because it is a great deal for your money and a good product.
